item.title: Learning How to Make a Blog
item.description: In which I explain how I made this website and everything I’ve learned in the process including html, css, design, webdesign, hugo, go and Javascript. If you are like me learning how to create a blog post please have a seat a join in this incredible storytell. Here’s an example blog post. Este é um blockquote este não sei será uma continuação Essa é uma Rubrica em html
